title: Family and Community

vocab.definition: People who live together and care for each other
The place where you live and the people around you
Someone who helps others in the community
Letters and packages delivered to homes
The number and street name of your home

teachingNotes: Discuss different family structures. Identify community helpers and their roles. Practice addresses and community locations.

sample.question: Who are some helpers in your community?
Where do you live in your community?
Who takes care of you at home?

truefalse.question: All families are exactly the same.
Police officers help keep people safe.
Families help take care of each other.
Only adults can be community helpers.

multiplechoice.question: Who helps when there's a fire?
Where do you go to learn?

fillintheblank.question: A _____ delivers mail to your house.
People who live near you are called _____.
A _____ is a group of people who care for each other.
The place where you live is your _____.
_____ help keep us safe in our community.

shortanswer.question: Tell me about your family.
expectedAny: I live with mom and dad

shortanswer.question: How do families help each other?
What places are in your community?
How can you be a good community member?
What jobs do community helpers have?
How are families different from each other?
Why do we need rules in our community?

wordProblems.question: There are 4 people in Sam's family and 3 people in Maya's family. How many people are in both families together?
The fire station has 5 firefighters working today and 3 more came to help. How many firefighters are there now?
On Main Street, there are 6 houses and 2 stores. How many buildings are on Main Street?
Emma's family has 2 adults and 3 children. How many family members does Emma have?
The mail carrier delivered 10 letters. If 4 were for neighbors on the left and the rest for neighbors on the right, how many went to the right?
At the community center, 7 families came for game night. If 2 families left early, how many families stayed?
The school has 8 teachers and 2 principals. How many adults work at the school?
